title: #1529 The Ones Who Care The Least, Do The Best
itunes:title: #1529 The Ones Who Care The Least, Do The Best
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing some tweets that Dr. Drew saw imploring them to talk more about the 1970s, leading to a conversation on hair styles. They also discuss the 'forgotten combover' that was Johnny Carson. Later they turn to the phones and speak to a caller with thoughts on President Biden's pledge to nominate an African American woman to the Supreme Court. They also speak to a caller out of Seattle who recently had a mask confrontation that he wants to tell the guys about.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
